tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very swift with his work and also had the job wonderfully in a very short amount of time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Met Dr Harsh few years back when I had a tooth ache and no other Dentist were able to find. Dr Harsh in a single sitting found out the issue and resolved it. Since then Dr Harsh and Dr Jigna are go to dentist for my whole family. The staff at the clinic are super responsive and helpful. Visiting doctors are also very experienced and friendly. I will anytime recommend Crown & Roots clinic for dental related treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was a great experience. The result is amazing with the doctor. 
He really worth recommendation for the treatment

Doctor is very polite and caring.Having expertise in dental care and having very good skill to do the treatment.his hand is so smooth that i have not got any pain during my cavity filling.Explaining issues simultaneously and interacting with me whil treatment to boost my confidence .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The Doctor and Staff are very friendly and soft nature . At the Time of Treatment the doctor and staff handle very well and try to do smoothly as possible for patient pain relaxation
Amazing doctor, has a good hand for not giving pain. Doctor is very friendly *** *************. I recommend him for sure

review: Thankyou doc did a very neat and gentle treatment, with lots of patience and it was painless.I will recommend you to my family and friends.

Dr. Nair is extremely polite & gentle.He makes sure that you understand the issue and provide proper guidance on the treatment required.I would definitely recommend others for any dental related issue, please visit this doctor.
